snippet.title: Steam 「A Street Cat's Tale 2」 Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
Little did our Cinnamon know...
that leaving home was a bad decision!

「A Street Cat's Tale 2」, the sequel of highly-praised kitty adventure game 「A Street Cat's Tale」,
is now available on Steam!

Featuring a variety of new "hoomans" and cats as well as
more interesting storyline with lots of content to enjoy!
Join the rocky Street Survival by a house cat Cinnamon, who chased the butterfly
and got lost in the middle of the foreign road!

● ‘A Street Cat's Tale 2’ Steam store page
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2356450/A_Street_Cats_Tale_2/

● PPIYO STUDIO Official Twitter
https://twitter.com/ppiyostudio

#AStreetCat'sTale2 #steam #cfk
